A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi takes some ambitious leaps in Act 1 of the movie. It's great. Unfortunately Act 2 is basically filler content\, and serves almost zero purpose in driving the story anywhere. Coming into Act 3 you actually realize that every thing this movie had set up for you was just really redundant and not worth the payoff of sitting through 2.5 hrs. I'm not even talking about the ending here\, just where we end up and how we got there is...annoying.
